avalancheActivity.comment: Freshly generated snowdrift accumulations are small-sized yet still often prone to triggering, particularly in gullies and bowls along the Salzburg border, such danger zones are easy to recognize. Avalanches can in isolated cases fracture down to more deeply embedded layers in the old snopwack and then grow to medium size.  On shady slopes and in high alpine zones the likelihood of triggering is higher. Caution urged especially in seldom-skied terrain.

snowpackStructure.comment: Freshly generated snowdrift accumulations lie deposited particularly above 2400m were depositedon W/N/E facing slopes. More deeply embedded inside the old snowpack are faceted, expansively metamorphosed weak layers, esp. on shady wind-protected slopes. Clear skies are forecast, with low temperatures and low air moisture. Thus, the snowpack will expansively metamorphose during the nocturnal hours. The snowpack is highly diverse even over small areas.

weatherForecast.comment: Intermittently dense clouds moving in during the afternoon from the south, occasional bright spells possible, mostly dry. Southerly winds will be moderate-strength, stronger only in summit zones. At 3000m: -7 degrees; at 2000m: -1 degree. Source: GeoSphere Austria

avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanches are hardly possible in gullies and bowls. Only little snow is on the ground.

snowpackStructure.comment: The old snowpack is expansively metamorphosed, with a loosely-packed surface with surface hoar and faceted crystals

tendency.highlights: No significant change expected in avalanche danger levels

weatherForecast.comment: Intermittently dense clouds moving in during the afternoon from the south, occasional bright spells possible, mostly dry. Southerly winds will be moderate-strength, stronger only in summmit zones. At 3000m: -7 degrees; at 2000m: -1 degree. Source: GeoSphere Austria

avalancheActivity.comment: Weak layers in the old snowpack can in isolated cases on shady slopes be triggered even by one sole skier. Caution urged esp. in transitions into gullies and bowls above 1800m and at the foot of rocky cliffs and behind protruberances in the landscape. Avalanches are mostly small-sized. Apart from the risks of being buried in snow masses, the dangers of being swept along and forced to take a fall need to be taken into condideration.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Caution: weak layers in the old snowpack

snowpackStructure.comment: Olderr snowdrift accumulations blanket a weak old snowpack, esp. on wind-protected shady sloppes. The snowpack will expansively metamorphose during the nocturnal hours. The snowpack is highly diverse even over small areas. Below 1600m very little snow on the ground.

tendency.highlights: No change expected in avalanche danger levels

weatherForecast.comment: Intermittently dense clouds moving in during the afternoon from the south, occasional bright spells possible, mostly dry. Southerly winds will be moderate-strength, stronger only in summmit zones. At 3000m: -7 degrees; at 2000m: -1 degree. Source: GeoSphere Austria

avalancheActivity.comment: Older snowdrift accumulations are generally small-sized, triggerable only in isolated cases, esp.on wind-protected shady slopes above 2000m, esp. in transitions into gullies and bowls and at the foot of rocky cliffs and behind protruberances in the landscape.  Apart from the risks of being buried in snow masses, the danger of being swept along and forced to take a fall require consideration.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Isolated danger zones in gullies and bowls

snowpackStructure.comment: The older snowdrifts blanket a weak old snowpack. The snowpack is highly diverse even over small areas. Only little snow on the ground from region to region below 1600m. Clear nighttime skies are forecast, with low temperatures and low air moisture. Thus, the snowpack will expansively metamorphose during the nocturnal hours. The snowpack is highly diverse even over small areas. Below 1600m very little snow on the ground.

customData.generalHeadline: Beware fresh snowdrift along the Salzburg border. Regionally little snow on the ground.
